ingredients:  '1/2 cups Butter', '1/2 cups Sugar', '1/2 cups Molasses', '1 whole Egg', '2-1/4 cups Sifted Flour', '2 teaspoons Baking Soda', '1 teaspoon Ginger', '1 teaspoon Cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoons Salt', '1/2 cups Water',<sep> directions: 'Cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Allow to stand at room temperature for 24 hours. Store in freezer. Yield: about 3 pints.'

ingredients:  '1 1/2 cups warm water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cups flour (all purpose or bread)', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/3 cup parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon italian seasoning', '2 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast',<sep> directions: 'Add all ingredients to bread pan in the order given.', 'Select dough cycle.', 'Add water if too dry. ingredients:  '1 bag Coleslaw (about 4 cups)', '1 cup slivered almonds', '4 tablespoons sesame seeds', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 package ramen noodles, crushed', '1 can mandarin orange, drained', '1 cup chopped cooked chicken', 'Yoshida gourmet sauce', '1/2 cup salad oil', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons rice vinegar', '3 tablespoons sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt & pepper',<sep> directions: 'Dressing: Combine the sugar, vinegars, oil, salt& pepper and soy sauce and mix well.', 'Marinate the chicken in the gourmet sauce for a couple hours before adding to the salad.', 'Mix the rest of the ingredients together and add the chicken and dressing.', 'Don't add the ramen noodles until just before serving or they will lose their crunch.'

ingredients:  '1/4 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon ground mustard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 large egg, lightly beaten', '1/3 cup white vinegar', '2 tablespoons water', '1 teaspoon butter', '1/2 cup mayonnaise', 'Torn mixed salad greens',<sep> directions: 'In a small saucepan, combine the sugar, flour, mustard and salt. ingredients:  '2/3 cup uncooked white rice', '1 1/3 cups water', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives (optional)', '1 teaspoon dried onion flakes (optional)', '2 teaspoons butter',<sep> directions: 'Bring the rice and water to a boil in a saucepan over high heat. ingredients:  '1/2 gallon milk 1 cup sugar 1cup long grain white rice 1 stick cinnamon 1 tsp vanilla extract 1 egg yolk 2-3 TBL flour',<sep> directions: 'in large 6-8 qt pot slowly bring milk to boil.stirring,do not let scald.lower temperature add rice,sugar,vanilla and cinnamon.let cook till rice softens about 1 hour.stir often.when soft reserve some warm milk, about 3/4cup.remove cinnamon stick.depending on how thick you prefer,add egg yolk to milk also add 1 tablespoon flour.mix .you do not have to add flour at all,it helps to thicken pudding.slowly add egg and flour to pudding.let cook slowly on low until it thickens.add cinnamon on top.eat warm or cold.'

ingredients:  '4 c. flour', '4 c. sugar', '1 1/4 c. cocoa', '1 1/4 c. powdered milk (dry form)', '6 tsp. baking powder', '2 tsp. salt',<sep> directions: 'Mix thoroughly and store in a cool place.'

ingredients:  '4 c. bite-size chicken pieces', '1 can cream of chicken or mushroom soup', '1 can chicken broth', '1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen peas and carrots', '1 1/2 c. flour', '2 tsp. baking powder', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. margarine, melted',<sep> directions: 'Heat oven to 350°.', 'Place chicken in lightly greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.', 'Mix soup and broth; pour over chicken.', 'Arrange peas and carrots over top.', 'Mix flour and baking powder in bowl; add milk and margarine.', 'Stir to form a thin dough; pour evenly over chicken.', 'Bake, uncovered, about 1 hour until crust rises to top and browns lightly.', 'Serves 6.'

ingredients:  '5 cups shredded cabbage', '1/2 cup cilantro roughtly chopped', '1 shredded carrot', '1/4 cup red bell pepper finely diced', '1 jalapeno thinly-sliced, optional', '2/3 cup mayonnaise', '2 1/2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla sugar',<sep> directions: 'Combine the cabbage, cilantro, carrot and peppers. ingredients:  '1 1/2 c. flour, sifted', '1 1/4 c. brown sugar', '1/2 c. input: ingredients:  '2 egg whites', '1 cup sugar', 'dash of salt', '1 lb. nuts', '1/4 lb. margarine',<sep> directions: 'Beat egg whites until stiff.', 'Add sugar and salt.', 'Beat as for meringue.', 'Add nuts to mixture and stir until well blended.', 'Melt margarine in shallow pan.', 'Spread nuts over margarine.'

ingredients:  'stale cake', 'jam', 'boiled custard',<sep> directions: 'Layer broken pieces of stale cake in a casserole dish.', 'Cover with jam, then pour boiled custard over both.', 'Steam or bake at 350° for 1 hour.'

ingredients:  '1 box yellow cake mix', '1 c. sugar', '1 small can coconut', '1 large can crushed pineapple', '1 large container Cool Whip', '1 large box vanilla pudding (not instant)',<sep> directions: 'Cook cake according to directions on the box in a 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Punch holes in the cake with a fork.', 'Cook pineapple with sugar until sugar dissolves.', 'Pour over cake.', 'Cook vanilla pudding according to directions and pour over pineapple.', 'Let cool.', 'Spread with Cool Whip, then sprinkle coconut on top.'

ingredients:  '6 medium potatoes (about 2 lbs.)', '1/2 head cabbage, shredded (about 3 cups)', '6 scallions, chopped', '1/4 cup water', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/3 cup milk', '1/4 cup butter', '1 teaspoon salt', 'pepper',<sep> directions: 'Peel the potatoes, cut into 1' chunks.Boil or steam the potatoes in salted water until fork tender, about 30 minutes. , drain.', 'Steam the cabbage, scallions, 1/4 cup water and 1/8 tsp.salt to boiling, reduce heat and cook until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes. (Don't forget to tuck a coin in for luck!).'

ingredients:  '6 medium yellow squash, sliced', '1 stick unsalted butter', '1/2 cup all-purpose flour', '1 cup sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon extract', '3 eggs', 'Three 9-inch frozen pie shells, defrosted',<sep> directions: 'Put the squash in a large pot and fill with water.', 'Bring to a boil over medium heat and cook until tender, 20 minutes.', 'Drain and press the squash with a spoon to remove any excess water.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.', 'Transfer the squash to a blender.', 'Add the butter and flour and blend until pureed.', 'Add the sugar, lemon extract and eggs and blend until smooth.', 'Evenly divide the filling among the pie shells.', 'Bake until the filling is set, 45 minutes to 1 hour.', 'Let the pies cool to room temperature before slicing and serving.'

ingredients:  '1/2 cup granulated sugar', '2 teaspoons orange zest',<sep> directions: 'Preheat oven to 180 Degrees Celcius and line the loaf pan with parchment paper that falls from the two long sides so it is easier to pull the loaf out from the pan. In a large bowl sift flour, salt and baking soda. Toss in the same bowl blueberries and dried nuts. Keep aside. In another bowl whisk together egg, brown sugar and granulated sugar until well combined, making sure there are no lumps. Add buttermilk, orange juice, oil, vanilla extract and orange zest. Give a stir. Slowly pour dry ingredients into the wet ingredients and gently whisk until everything is well incorporated. Do not overmix at this stage as it will turn the loaf hard. Pour the batter in the prepared loaf pan and bake for around 45 mins to 1 hour. Mine got done in exactly 50 mins. Insert a toothpick at the centre of the bread, if it comes out clean then the loaf is done. Allow the loaf to cool on wire rack completely before slicing them into pieces.'

ingredients:  '2 c. Bisquick mix', '1 egg', '1/2 c. oil', '1 1/3 c. club soda',<sep> directions: 'Mix well; pour onto a hot', 'griddle for pancakes or into your waffle iron for delicious waffles.'

ingredients:  '1 lb. ground beef, browned', '1 envelope onion soup mix', '1 can tomato soup', '1 qt. tomatoes',<sep> directions: 'Chop and add potatoes, carrots, onion, celery, green beans and corn (any or all).', 'Add garlic salt, celery salt and pepper to taste.', 'Place all ingredients in a crock-pot on high for 4 to 5 hours.', 'Turn to low and simmer.'

ingredients:  '2 Tbsp. vinegar', '1/3 c. sugar', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1 1/2 c. beet liquid (plus water to make 1 1/2 cup)', '2 c. cooked beets or can beets',<sep> directions: 'Bring to a boil vinegar, beet juice, sugar, salt and beets. Serve warm or let cool.', 'Add chopped onions for a salad.'

ingredients:  '1 package (10 To 12 Pieces In A Package) Graham Crackers', '2 sticks Butter', '1 cup Brown Sugar', '1 cup Chocolate Chips', '1/2 cups Slivered Or Sliced Almonds',<sep> directions: 'Line an 11x15 inch cookie sheet with whole crackers. ingredients:  '1 qt. milk', '15 Fig Newton cookies', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '3 eggs, separated',<sep> directions: 'Crumble Fig Newtons into milk; soak about 30 minutes.', 'Add sugar and salt to this.', 'Beat egg yolks and add to mixture.', 'Beat egg whites until stiff and fold into mixture.'

ingredients:  '4 tablespoons canola oil', '1 lb ground beef (gently formed into 6 balls)', '2 medium yellow onions (very thinly sliced with a mandoline or a sharp knife and divided into 6 equal portions)', 'kosher salt, to taste', '6 slices American cheese', '6 hamburger buns, toasted',<sep> directions: 'Working in 2 batches, heat 2 tablespoons oil in a 12' cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat.', 'Add 3 beef balls and, using the back of a spatula, press down on them until they're thin; cook for 1 minute.', 'Top each patty with a portion of the onions; season with salt.', 'Press onions into the meat and cook for 1 minute more.', 'Flip burgers; flatten with the spatula. ingredients:  '1 c. long grain rice', '1 can French onion soup', '1 can chicken broth', '1 c. grated cheese', '1 small pkg. almonds', '1 small can mushrooms', '1 small jar pimento', '1 stick butter', 'pepper to taste', 'garlic to taste',<sep> directions: 'Bake at 375° for 1 hour in covered dish.'

ingredients:  '6 to 10 peeled bananas', '1 pkg. vanilla wafers', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding mix', '1 container Cool Whip', '1 can Eagle Brand milk',<sep> directions: 'Layer a large bowl with bananas, then wafers. ingredients:  '2 scoops orange sorbet', '2 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '6 tablespoons tequila', '4 ice cubes', '2 teaspoons grenadine', '1 scoop orange sorbet (actually 2 mini scoops)',<sep> directions: 'Combine the 2 large scoops of orange sorbet & juice with the tequila in a blender & process SLOWLY until smooth.', 'Place ice cubes in a tall glass & pour in the sorbet mixture.', 'Slowly pour the grenadine into the glass & allow to settle.', 'Stir once & decorate with mini scoops of sorbet (& a slice of orange, if desired).'

ingredients:  '2 cups whole wheat flour', '2 cups milk', '1/3 cup oil', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '2 eggs, separated', '1 pinch salt', '1 cup fresh blueberries or 1 cup frozen blueberries',<sep> directions: 'Separate the eggs, then beat the whites until they reach the soft peak stage. Set aside.', 'sift together the flour, salt, and powder.', 'blend the egg yolks, milk and oil into the flour mixture until well mixed.', 'carefully fold in the egg whites.', 'carefully stir in the blueberries--the more movement the berries have in the batter, the more likely they are to turn the batter purple.', 'spoon onto a greased waffle iron.', 'cook until done.'

ingredients:  '12 whole Eggs, Boiled 10 Minutes, Cooled, Peeled And Halved.', '2 Tablespoons Butter', '2-1/2 Tablespoons Plain Flour', '2 cups Whole Milk', '1/2 teaspoons Salt', '1/8 teaspoons Pepper', '1-1/2 cup Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese',<sep> directions: 'Place egg halves yolk side up in a buttered 9x13 pan.', 'In a sauce pan, melt butter over low heat. ingredients:  '2 pounds of sliced chicken breast (approx. 8 lg. pieces)', '1 cup of teriyaki sauce', '1 tablespoon of cajun seasoning salt', '1 tablespoon of melted butter', '1 or 2 pieces of juicy lime',<sep> directions: 'Mix the teriyaki sauce and cajun seasoning in a small bowl. ingredients:  '1 graham cracker crust or Oreo cookie crust', '1 c. or 20 pieces caramel', '1/2 c. cream', '3/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips', '2 c. pecan pieces',<sep> directions: 'Melt caramel over low heat, stirring frequently to avoid burning.', 'After caramel is melted, stir in 1/4 cup cream until blended.', 'Stir in 2 cups pecan pieces.', 'Pour into crust and spread evenly.'

ingredients:  '1 each large potato, diced', '4 oz cabbage, chopped', '2 each eggs', '8 oz corned beef, diced',<sep> directions: 'Cook the potatoes, corned beef, and cabbage in a skillet', 'When potatoes are browned, make two seperate piles of mixture.', 'Make a well in each pile, and crack an egg into well.', 'Cook until egg is cooked to your liking.', 'Place skillet under broiler for faster cooking of the yolk.'

ingredients:  '3 Ripe avocados pitted peeled and mashed', '1 10 oz can ro*tel original diced tomatoes in green chilies drained', '3/4 cup Chopped onion', '1 tsp Lemon or lime juice', '1/2 tsp salt', '1 Ground black pepper', '1 Serve with tortilla chips',<sep> directions: 'Mix avocados, drain tomatoes and onions lemon or lime juice and salt in a medium bowl until well blended.', 'Season with black pepper to taste serve with tortilla chips if desired.'

ingredients:  '2 12-ounce packages frozen pureed winter (butternut) squash, defrosted', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 cup unsweetened applesauce', '1 cup light or heavy cream', '1/4 cup ground toasted walnuts', '2 teaspoons dried chervil, crumbled', '1/2 teaspoon ground mace', 'Salt and white pepper to taste', '1/2 cup toasted walnut pieces, for garnish',<sep> directions: 'Combine all the ingredients except the walnuts pieces in a large saucepan and stir to blend well.', 'Cook the soup over medium heat until warmed through, about six to eight minutes.', 'Ladle the soup into bowls and add a few chopped walnut pieces in the center.'

Cool Whip',<sep> directions: 'Mix together 1 cup buttermilk and vanilla pudding.', 'Add 1 can crushed pineapple (16 ounces), drained, 1 can mandarin oranges, drained and 8 ounces Cool Whip.', 'Just before serving add 14 Keebler fudge stripe cookies broken in pieces.'

ingredients:  '2 cans black eyed peas, liquid removed', '1 c. salad oil', '1/2 c. wine vinegar', '1/4 c. chopped onion', '1 garlic clove', '1/2 teaspoon salt',<sep> directions: 'Mix all ingredients in jar and let set in refrigerator for at least 2 days, the longer the better.', 'Remove garlic after 1 day.'

ingredients:  '4 bananas', '3/8 c. lemon juice', '3/8 c. bread crumbs', '1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar', '3/4 tsp. ground allspice',<sep> directions: 'Peel and cut bananas into 2-inch pieces.', 'Brush with lemon juice.', 'Roll in mixture of bread crumbs, sugar and allspice. ingredients:  '6 eggs', '4 ounces light cream cheese, diced', '1/4 cup chopped green onions', '1/4 cup chopped fresh basil or 2 teaspoons dried, crumbled', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons milk', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh oregano or 1/2 teaspoon dried, crumbled', '2 tablespoons (1/4 stick) butter',<sep> directions: 'Beat eggs in large bowl to blend.', 'Beat in next 6 ingredients.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat.', 'Add egg mixture and stir until eggs are scrambled, about 4 minutes.', 'Serve immediately.'

ingredients:  '8 frozen shrimp', '1 cup water',<sep> directions: 'Put shrimp in a microwave safe cup and cover with water (I always use my pyrex liquid measuring cup).', 'Microwave on high for 50 seconds, let sit 50 seconds.', 'Microwave on high 30 seconds, let sit 30 seconds.', 'Peel and use as is or add ice to the glass to cool to room temperature for salads or dips.'

ingredients:  '4 c. frozen peas, thawed and drained', '1/2 c. Miracle Whip', '1/2 c. sour cream', '1/4 c. bacon bits', '1/4 c. chopped onion', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper',<sep> directions: 'Combine Miracle Whip, sour cream, bacon bits, onion, sugar and spices.', 'Pour over peas.', 'Let stand as is, or gently stir together.', 'Top with grated Cheddar cheese, if desired.', 'Serves 10 to 12.'

ingredients:  '3 eggs', '1/2 c. evaporated skim milk', '1 c. low-fat milk', '6 packets Sweet 'N Low', '2 tsp. vanilla', '2 medium bananas, peeled and sliced', '1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice', '1 (9-inch) cracker crust',<sep> directions: 'In top double boiler, beat eggs with evaporated and low-fat milk.', 'Heat over hot water, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Stir in Sweet 'N Low and vanilla. ingredients:  '2 cups Orzo Pasta', '1 Tablespoon Vegetable Or Olive Oil', '1/3 cups Chopped Onion', '2 whole Zucchini Squash, Diced', '1 cup Fresh Or Frozen Corn Kernels', '1 Tablespoon Chopped Fresh Basil Or 1 T Dried', '1 whole Ripe Tomato, Diced',<sep> directions: 'Cook orzo in boiling, salted water for 10 minutes. ingredients:  '1/2 Lb of Fresh Ahi Tuna (MUST be sushi quality)', '2 Avacodos, ripe', '1 bunch of fresh Cilantro', '1 Lime', 'Salt', 'Pepper', 'Cheyenne Pepper/Wasabi (optional)',<sep> directions: 'On a clean, plastic cutting board, cut the tuna into 1/4 in cubes (about the size of a bullion cube) and place into a large bowl. ingredients:  '1-1/4 cups sugar', '2 cups milk', '2 tsp grated lemon rind', '1/3 cup lemon juice', '2 egg whites', '2 cups whipping cream',<sep> directions: 'Add 1/4 cup sugar to milk and stir until thoroughly dissolved. ingredients:  '2 c. flour', '2 c. sugar', '1/2 lb. oleo (2 sticks)', '4 Tbsp. cocoa', '1/2 c. buttermilk', '1 c. water', '1/2 tsp. cinnamon', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 eggs', '1 tsp. baking soda',<sep> directions: 'Sift flour and sugar.', 'Combine oleo, cocoa and water.', 'Bring to a boil.', 'Pour over flour and sugar.', 'Mix real good.', 'Add buttermilk, cinnamon, vanilla, eggs and soda; beat well.', 'Pour into greased and floured shallow 16 x 11-inch pan.', 'Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes.'

ingredients:  '4 cups wild arugula', '2 cups broccoli florets', '1 cup cherry tomatoes', '1 tablespoon diced red onion', '2 tablespoons raw sliced almonds', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt to taste', 'Ground black pepper to taste',<sep> directions: 'Chop the broccoli florets and tomatoes, individually, into small pieces.', 'Roughly chop the arugula then add previously chopped tomatoes, broccoli, red onions, sliced almonds and give it another rough chop.', 'Whisk together balsamic vinegar and oil and drizzle over the salad.', 'Toss the salad with vinaigrette, salt and lots of ground black pepper.'

ingredients:  '4 rainbow trout fillets (4- to 5-oz. each)', '1/4 cup fresh orange juice', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '4 teaspoons caribbean jerk seasoning',<sep> directions: 'Coat a rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. ingredients:  '2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened', '1 (10 oz.) Cracker Barrel sharp cheese', '2 1/2 Tbsp. mayo', '3 drops Worcestershire sauce', '2 cans crabmeat, drained',<sep> directions: 'Shred cheese.', 'Mix everything (very thick).', 'Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes, until it is bubbly and brown at edges. Serve hot.'

Bisquick',<sep> directions: 'Heat oven to 325°.', 'Grease pie plate 10 1/2 x 1 1/2-inch.', 'Mix apples and spices.', 'Turn into pie plate.', 'Beat remaining ingredients until smooth (15 seconds in blender on high or 1 minute with hand beater).', 'Pour over apples.', 'Sprinkle with Streusel.'

ingredients:  '3/4 c. shortening', '3/4 c. brown sugar', '3/4 c. molasses', '3 level tsp. soda', '2 eggs', '3 Tbsp. warm water', '3 c. flour', '2 tsp. ginger', '2 tsp. cream of tartar', '1/2 tsp. salt',<sep> directions: 'Cream shortening and sugar, add molasses and soda, beat until foamy.', 'Add eggs and beat well.', 'Add water and all dry ingredients, beat until smooth.', 'Allow to cool several hours or overnight in refrigerator.', 'Roll out and bake in 400° oven 12 - 15 minutes.'

ingredients:  '1 large egg', '2/3 c. mayonnaise', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1/2 c. stuffing mix', '1 can cream of mushroom soup, diluted', '1 (16 oz.) bag frozen broccoli, cooked slightly', '1 c. grated Swiss or Cheddar cheese',<sep> directions: 'Whisk egg slightly, blending in mayonnaise and soup.', 'Stir in drained broccoli, onion and cheese.', 'Turn into a 2-quart baking dish.', 'Sprinkle with stuffing mix.', 'Bake in preheated 350° oven for 35 minutes or until bubbly.', 'After about 15 minutes, cover slightly with foil so it won't burn too much.'

Drain and set aside.', 'While the farro cooks, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat; cook the cauliflower and onion in the hot oil until the cauliflower begins to soften and the onion starts to become clear, 7 to 10 minutes. Stir the carrot, celery, and salt into the cauliflower mixture; continue cooking and stirring until the cauliflower is completely tender.', 'Combine the farro and the cauliflower mixture in a large bowl; stir to mix evenly. Pour the lemon juice over the mixture and stir. Serve immediately.'

ingredients:  ['1 box devil's food cake', '1 pkg cream cheese (at room temp)', '1 lg pkg instant chocolate pudding', '2-3 cups milk', '(ingredients to make cake: egg, oil)', 'whipping cream',<sep> directions: 'prepare half of cake in a 9x13 pan as per directions and set out to cool. in a bowl, whip cream cheese until soft and smooth. mix in 1 cup milk and blend til smooth. add pudding and remaining cup milk and blend til smooth but firm. (may need to add a little more milk). layer mixture on top of cake and refrigerate. before serving, prepare whipping cream (1tbsp sugar and splash of vanilla) and layer on top of pudding mixture. chill and serve. may be topped with slivered almonds.'

ingredients:  '1 box yellow cake mix', '1 small box instant vanilla pudding mix', '1 small box instant chocolate pudding mix', '1 1/2 c. water', '1/2 c. oil', '4 eggs', '6 oz. Pour mixture into prepared crust.', 'Bake at 375° for 45 minutes or until set. Remove cheesecake from the oven; cool on wire rack. Cover and chill 8 hours. ingredients:  '2 servings Pasta', '1 pack Smoked salmon', '1/2 of an onion Sliced onions', '2 tbsp Margarine', '2 tbsp Flour', '100 ml Milk', '100 ml Heavy cream', '2 tsp Soup stock cube', '1 Salt', '1 Pepper', '1 Parmesan cheese',<sep> directions: 'While you're boiling the pasta, heat margarine in a pan and lightly saute the onion.', 'Add smoked salmon, give it a stir, add flour and lightly saute.', 'Add cream, milk and soup stock cube and cook over low heat.', 'When the pasta is done, add to the pan (you don't have to drain it.)', 'Season with salt, pepper and parmesan cheese and you're done!'

ingredients:  '3/4 c. sugar', '3 Tbsp. instant potato flakes', '1 c. warm water',<sep> directions: 'Mix together with wooden spoon in a quart jar.', 'Let stand, uncovered, on counter at least 5 days.', 'Stir several times each day.', 'At end of 5 days, feed again with same proportions of sugar, potato flakes and warm water.', 'Mix thoroughly.', 'Allow to stand at room temperature for 8 to 12 hours.', 'Remove 1 cup to make bread. ingredients:  '1 pound sweet potatoes, peeled and coarsely grated', '2 scallions, finely chopped', '1/2 cup plus 2 teaspoons all-purpose flour', '2 large eggs, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', 'Vegetable oil',<sep> directions: 'Stir together potatoes, scallions, flour, eggs, salt, and pepper.', 'Heat a film of oil in a deep 12-inch non-stick skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking.', 'Working in batches of 4, spoon 1/8 cup potato mixture per latke into the oil and flatten to 3-inch diameter with a slotted spatula.', 'Reduce heat to moderate and cook until golden, about 1 1/2 minutes on each side.', 'Transfer latkes with spatula to paper towels to drain.'

ingredients:  'Red Beans', '3 (15 ounce) cans red beans, do not drain (I buy the New Orleans Style beans)', '1 lb smoked sausage, sliced', '4 tablespoons butter', '1/2 teaspoon white pepper', '1 teaspoon cajun seasoning (I use Tony Chachere's)', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 teaspoon liquid smoke (optional depending on how smokey your sausage is)', 'Rice', '1 1/2 cups white rice', '3 cups water', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '2 tablespoons butter',<sep> directions: 'Rice:', 'Bring water to boil, add remaining ingredients and cook on medium low for 20 minutes.', 'Beans:', 'Melt butter, lightly brown sausage.', 'Add remaining ingredients. Simmer on medium low while cooking rice.'

ingredients:  '1 pkg. (6 oz.) baby spinach leaves', '1 cup coarsely chopped mangos Whole Foods 2 ea For $4.00 thru 02/09', '1 cup fresh strawberries, quartered', '1/2 cup thin red onion slices, separated into rings', '1/4 cup KRAFT Lite Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing', '1/4 tsp. ground black pepper', '1/4 cup toasted chopped PLANTERS Walnuts',<sep> directions: 'Cover platter with spinach; top with fruit and onions.', 'Top with remaining ingredients just before serving.'

ingredients:  '1 1/2 cups flour', '1 tablespoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon baking soda', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 cup butter room temperature', '1 1/4 cups sugar', '3 eggs',<sep> directions: 'In large bowl of stand mixer, fitted with paddle attachment, cream together the butter and sugar until pale.', 'Beat in eggs, 1 at a time until light and fluffy.', 'Complete recipe can be found at http://adayinthelifeonthefarm.blogspot.com/2016/07/rose-and-ginger-cupcakes-for-final-day.html'

ingredients:  '1 (16 oz.) can kitchen sliced green beans, drained', '1 (16 oz.) can sliced carrots, drained', '1 c. chopped onions', '4 oz. (1 c.) American process cheese, cubed', '6 to 8 snack crackers, crushed',<sep> directions: 'Combine beans, carrots, onions and cheese in a lightly greased 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Top with cracker crumbs.', 'Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes. Serves 6 to 8.'

ingredients:  '4 whole Peaches, Pitted', '4 whole Nectarines, Pitted', '1/2 cups Pecans', '2 teaspoons Vanilla', '5 Tablespoons Butter, Cut Into Pats', '4 sprigs Rosemary (Plus Additional For Garnish If Desired.)', '2 Tablespoons Honey (Plus Additional For Drizzling.)', '12 ounces, weight Mascarpone Cheese',<sep> directions: 'Preheat oven to 350 F. Drizzle honey over entire dish.', 'Bake uncovered for 15 minutes, then remove dish from oven and spoon the liquid in the dish over the fruit.', 'Bake for 15 additional minutes then immediately serve, topping each serving with mascarpone, additional drizzled honey, pecans and rosemary garnish.'

input: ingredients:  '15 whole graham crackers', '1/2 cup butter', '1/2 cup margarine', '1/2 cup white sugar', '3/4 cup finely chopped pecans',<sep> directions: 'Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Arrange the graham crackers in a single layer on a baking sheet, making sure the crackers touch each other.', 'Heat the butter, margarine, and white sugar in a saucepan over medium heat until the sugar is dissolved, about 2 minutes. Stir in the pecans. Spread the butter mixture over the graham crackers.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until butter mixture is absorbed, 8 to 10 minutes. Immediately transfer the crackers to cool on aluminum foil or wax paper. Once cooked, break crackers into bite-sized pieces.'

ingredients:  '1/2 1/2 cup cooked pork or 1/2 cup cooked beef', '1 (10 inch) flour tortillas, warmed', '1/2 cup pace enchilada sauce', '1/2 cup shredded monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend',<sep> directions: 'PLACE chicken down center of tortilla. Top with half the enchilada sauce and half the cheese. Roll up and place seam-side down on microwave-safe plate. Top with remaining sauce and cheese.', 'MICROWAVE on HIGH 1 1/2 to 2 minute or until cheese melts.', 'Serves 1.', 'TIP: For a Cheesy Enchilada: Omit chicken and use 1 cup cheese. Place 3/4 cup cheese on tortilla. Top with half the enchilada sauce. Roll up and prepare as above.'

ingredients:  '1 cup butter, softened', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 cup (4 ounces) shredded sharp cheddar cheese', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground red pepper', '2 cups crisp rice cereal',<sep> directions: 'Cream butter; add flour and next 3 ingredients, mixing until well blended. Stir in cereal. Shape mixture into 1-inch balls. Place balls about 1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheets. Flatten each ball with a fork dipped in flour. Bake at 325 degrees for 20 to 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Let cool completely on wire racks.'

ingredients:  '3 T kosher salt', '8 plum tomatoes, cored, halved, and seeded', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 baguette (about 10 oz) cut into large pieces', '1/2 small yellow onion', '1 C EVOO, plus more for drizzling', '2 T sherry vinegar', 'freshly ground pepper to taste', '3 hard boiled eggs, chopped', '1 1/2 C finely chopped Iberian ham or prosciutto',<sep> directions: 'Place salt, tomatoes, garlic, bread and onion in a bowl, cover with boiling water, and let sit for 1 hour. Drain vegetables, reserving 1 C soaking liquid; place in blender. Squeeze water from bread; place in blender with reserved liquid, oil, and vinegar. Pureee until smooth; season with salt and pepper, and chill. Pour into serving bowls; top with eggs, ham, and a drizzle of oil'

ingredients:  '1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand milk', '1/4 c. lemon juice', '1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple', '1 c. chopped pecans', '1 (13 1/2 oz.) container Cool Whip', '2 (9-inch) graham cracker pie crusts',<sep> directions: 'Mix together milk and lemon juice. Refrigerate until cool. Drain pineapple thoroughly. Add to juice mixture.', 'Stir in pecans. Fold in Cool Whip and blend thoroughly.', 'Pour into pie crusts and chill at least 30 minutes before serving.', 'Makes 2 pies.'

ingredients:  '1 (8 oz.) box small elbow macaroni', '1/4 c. pimento, chopped', '1/4 c. bell pepper, chopped', '1 can cream of mushroom soup', '1 lb. grated cheese (can use 1/2 white and 1/2 Cheddar)', '1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef, browned', '1 c. grated onion', '1 c. mayonnaise', 'bread crumbs (optional)',<sep> directions: 'Boil macaroni and drain.', 'Mix other ingredients with macaroni and put in a 9 x 12-inch casserole dish.', 'Top with buttered bread crumbs (or cheese).', 'Bake at 350° for about 45 minutes or until it bubbles.', 'This can be made in advance and baked later.', 'You can leave out the ground beef for just a side dish.'

ingredients:  '3/4 cup sugar', '1/2 cup rock salt', '1/2 cup gin', '1 bunch dill finely chopped, plus additional, to garnish', '2 cloves garlic crushed', '4 juniper berries bruised', '1 salmon side, skin on, 2 3/4 lbs, boned', 'crackers', 'cream cheese',<sep> directions: 'Combine sugar, rock salt, gin, dill, garlic and juniper berries in a large shallow dish. Add fish, turning to coat well. Place, flesh-side down. Cover with plastic wrap.', 'Refrigerate for 48 hours.', 'When ready to serve, rinse fish well. Pat dry with paper towels. Place on a serving platter, skin side down, and sprinkle with additional dill.', 'Slice salmon thinly, starting from head end, on an angle. Serve with crackers and cream cheese.'

ingredients:  '1/2 lb. vanilla wafers', '1/2 c. butter', '1 1/2 c. powdered sugar', '2 eggs, unbeaten', '1/2 pt. cream, whipped', 'small can crushed pineapple, drained',<sep> directions: 'Crush wafers and spread half in buttered pan.', 'Cream butter, sugar and eggs well.', 'Pour this mixture over the crumbs.', 'Over this, spread whipped cream, sweetened a bit.', 'Over the cream, spread the crushed pineapple.', 'Cover with remaining wafer crumbs. Let refrigerate overnight.', 'Cut in squares and serve with whipped cream.'

ingredients:  '1/2 cup no-sugar-added peanut butter', '1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce', '1 tablespoon coconut oil', '1/4 cup blueberries', '2 cups oats',<sep> directions: 'Add the wet ingredients and mix thoroughly.', 'Drop in the oats; stir to combine.', 'Form tablespoon-size balls and dust with more oats.', 'Refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Enjoy!'

ingredients:  'ice cubes', '1 1/2 ounces (1 jigger) French brandy', '1 1/2 ounces (1 jigger) Curacao', 'a lemon twist for garnish if desired',<sep> directions: 'In a cocktail shaker half-filled with the ice combine the brandy and the Curacao and shake the mixture for 30 seconds. Pour or strain the drink into a tall glass, add more ice, and garnish the drink with the lemon twist.'

ingredients:  '3 to 4 chicken breasts, cooked and diced', '2 cans cream of chicken soup', '1/2 c. sour cream', '2 rolls Ritz crackers, crushed', '1 stick oleo, melted',<sep> directions: 'In the bottom of a large casserole, place 1 package of crushed Ritz crackers, a mixture of chicken pieces, soup and sour cream, then another package of crushed Ritz crackers mixed with 1 stick melted oleo.', 'Bake at 350° for 15 to 30 minutes until hot.', 'Make 4 to 6 servings.'

ingredients:  '1/2 yellow cake mix', '8 oz. cream cheese', '2 c. milk', '1 small instant vanilla pudding', '1 large can crushed pineapple', 'Cool Whip',<sep> directions: 'Bake cake in 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Cool.', 'Beat soft cream cheese; add milk and pudding slowly.', 'Spread on cake.', 'Add drained pineapple; top with Cool Whip.', 'Top with nuts (optional). Refrigerate.'

ingredients:  '2 sticks oleo, melted', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1 1/2 c. flour', '3 c. quick oats', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 tsp. black walnut flavor', '1 c. chopped nuts',<sep> directions: 'Mix in order given.', 'Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350° for 30 minutes.'

ingredients:  '2 red bell peppers', '2 yellow or green bell peppers', '2 lb. beefsteak, trimmed', '3 Tbsp. olive oil', '1 garlic clove, peeled and finely minced', '3 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley', 'salt and black pepper',<sep> directions: 'Broil peppers until charred on all sides.', 'Remove and place them in paper bag (to steam) for 10 minutes; remove skins and seeds.', 'Slice peppers into thin strips.', 'Set aside.'

ingredients:  '1 stick margarine', '1 (16 oz.) pkg. butterscotch morsels', '1/2 to 3/4 c. peanut butter', '1 box Rice Chex cereal', 'confectioners sugar to coat',<sep> directions: 'Melt all ingredients, except cereal and sugar, together.', 'Pour over cereal, then put in bag of confectioners sugar and shake to coat.'

ingredients:  '1 small pkg. sirloin hamburger', '1 tsp. or less finely chopped onion', '1 pkg. elbow macaroni', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 large (28 oz.) can tomatoes (juice too)', '1 small (14.5 oz.) can tomatoes (juice too)', '1 pkg. sharp Cheddar cheese, cubed', '1 dash garlic salt plus salt and pepper to taste', '1 pinch oregano',<sep> directions: 'Brown hamburger with onion and drain off all fat.', 'Cook macaroni in water with the 1 tablespoon of butter until tender. Drain.'

ingredients:  '1 can mandarin oranges', '1 large can pineapple chunks', '1 large can peaches, sliced', '3 sliced bananas',<sep> directions: 'Strawberries, blueberries and diced apple may be added if desired.', 'Drain all canned fruit.'

ingredients:  '1 box yellow cake mix', '1/2 c. oil', '4 eggs', '1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream', '1 pkg. instant pudding', '1/3 c. poppy seed', '1/2 c. cream sherry wine',<sep> directions: 'Mix ingredients together.', 'Bake in a Bundt pan at 350°.'

ingredients:  '1 pkg. white cake mix', '1 pkg. strawberry Jell-O', '1/2 c. Wesson oil', '1/2 c. milk', '4 whole eggs', '1/2 c. mashed strawberries',<sep> directions: 'Mix cake mix and Jell-O.', 'Add remaining ingredients.', 'Bake in greased oblong 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Bake at 350°', 'for 30 minutes.'

ingredients:  '1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '12 cup cranberry sauce', '8 flour tortillas or 8 whole wheat tortillas', '12 cup creamy peanut butter',<sep> directions: 'Combine cream cheese and cranberry sauce in a small bowl until well blended.', 'Spread four tortillas with cranberry-cream cheese mixture to within 1/2-inch of the edges of tortillas.', 'Top each tortilla with a second tortilla.', 'Spread top tortilla with peanut butter, to within 1/2-inch of edges.', 'Carefully roll up the layered tortillas.', 'Wrap each securely in plastic wrap.', 'Refrigerate for several hours or overnight.', 'Remove from refrigerator to serve.', 'Unwrap.', 'Slice each tortilla into 4 to 8 slices.', 'Serve with additional chutney for dipping, if desired.'

input: ingredients:  '1 clove garlic', '2 Tbsp. shortening', '1 1/2 lb. lean beef cubes', '1 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. sugar', '1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced', '1 large green pepper, cut in strips', '1 (12 oz.) jar Heinz Homestyle onion gravy',<sep> directions: 'Saute garlic in shortening.', 'Add meat.', 'Brown well over high heat, stirring constantly.', 'Sprinkle in salt and sugar.', 'Add mushrooms.', 'Cover; simmer 45 minutes or until meat is tender. Stir in green pepper and gravy.', 'Simmer, uncovered, 20 to 25 minutes.', 'Serve over rice or noodles.', 'Serves 6.'

ingredients:  '4 c diced, peeled turnips', '3 Tbsp. oleo', '1/2 c. chopped onion', '1/2 c. shredded carrot', '1 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '1 Tbsp. chopped parsley',<sep> directions: 'In saucepan, bring 1-inch of water to a boil.', 'Add turnips; cook until tender, about 20 minutes.', 'Drain.', 'Saute carrots and onion in oleo until tender.', 'Stir in turnips, salt, pepper and parsley.', 'Cook, turning frequently, to well heated, 5 to 10 minutes.'

ingredients:  '1 lb Italian sausage', '3/4 cup finely chopped onion', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '3 (15 ounce) cans tomato sauce', '1 cup water', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 bay leaves', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 teaspoons salt',<sep> directions: 'Brown the sausage with the onion and drain.', 'Add the rest of the ingredients and simmer, partly covered, for 2 hours.', 'Simmering can be done in a crockpot, if desired.', 'This makes alot of sauce and can be frozen beautifully.'

ingredients:  '8 oz. cream cheese', '1/2 stick margarine', '2 (8 oz.) Cool Whip', '1 c. powdered sugar', '2 (3 oz.) instant vanilla pudding', '3 1/2 c. cold milk', '2 (1 lb.) pkg. Process Oreos.', 'Layer mixture and Oreos, ending with Oreos.'

ingredients:  '1 lb asparagus', 'olive oil', 'salt', 'minced garlic (however much you like)',<sep> directions: 'Preheat oven to 450°F.', 'Spread asparagus in a single layer on a shallow baking pan or baking sheet.', 'Drizzle lightly with olive oil.', 'Sprinkle salt to taste.', 'Spread minced garlic over all stalks.', 'Place pan in oven for 10-12 minutes--stalks should be roasted, but still crisp.', 'Serve immediately.'

ingredients:  '2 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese with chives', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese', 'garlic salt to taste',<sep> directions: 'Let set until soft enough to make ball, then cover with nuts. Refrigerate until time to serve.'

ingredients:  '2 uncooked pie shells', '1 stick margarine', '1 (12 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained', '1 c. coconut', '1 c. pecans', '4 eggs, beaten', '1 1/4 c. sugar',<sep> directions: 'Mix margarine and sugar in a large bowl.', 'Add beaten eggs and mix well.', 'Add drained pineapple, coconut and nuts.', 'Mix well. ingredients:  '1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs', '1 c. soda cracker crumbs', '1/4 c. melted oleo', '2 pkg. instant chocolate pudding', '2 c. milk', '1 qt. vanilla ice cream', '1 (16 oz.) Cool Whip', '2 Butterfinger candy bars',<sep> directions: 'Mix crumb mixture and butter together.', 'Put 2/3 of this in bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Mix pudding and milk with mixer.', 'Add ice cream, whip for 1 minute or a little longer.', 'Pour over crumb mixture.', 'Spoon Cool Whip over top.', 'Sprinkle remainder of crumb mixture on top.', 'Crush candy bars and put on top.', 'Refrigerate until ready to eat.'

ingredients:  '1 stick margarine', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '2 medium apples, peeled, cored and chopped fine', '1/2 c. chopped nuts', '1 c. flour', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '1/2 tsp. baking soda', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. cinnamon',<sep> directions: 'Cream margarine.', 'Add sugar gradually.', 'Beat egg until light and beat into mixture until creamy.', 'Mix in the chopped apples and nuts.'

ingredients:  '1 tablespoon sour cream', '1 (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch (R))', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese', '1/2 pound Cheddar cheese, shredded', '1/4 cup finely chopped pecans',<sep> directions: 'Mix the sour cream with ranch dressing mix in a bowl until smoothly combined. Add the cream cheese and Cheddar cheese to the bowl, and mix together with your hands until thoroughly blended. Chill the mixture for 5 minutes, then shape into a ball.', 'Place the pecans into a shallow bowl, and roll all sides of the cheese ball in the pecans to coat. Serve immediately.'

ingredients:  '1/2 c. water', '1 c. tomato juice', '2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello', '1 (60 oz.) can spicy V-8 juice', '1 3/4 c. tomato juice', '2 Tbsp. white vinegar', '1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 c. onion, chopped and diced (if desired)', '1/2 c. cucumbers, chopped and diced (if desired)', '1/2 c. celery, chopped and diced (if desired)',<sep> directions: 'Mix the water with 1 cup of tomato juice; heat until boiling. Dissolve in this the jello; gently stir.', 'Now add the V-8, tomato juice, vinegar and Worcestershire sauce.', 'Chill until it starts to jell.', 'Then add, if desired, the chopped vegetables.'

ingredients:  '1/2 c. chopped green onions', '2 Tbsp. melted margarine', '1 (17 oz.) can cream-style corn', '1 (7 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained', '1 c. cracker crumbs', '1 c. milk', '2 eggs, slightly beaten', '1/2 tsp. salt',<sep> directions: 'Saute green onions in butter or margarine until tender.', 'Stir in corn and remaining ingredients.', 'Spoon mixture into a lightly greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.', 'Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes.', 'Yield: 6 servings.', 'May be doubled.'

ingredients:  '4 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature', '1 -2 tablespoon fresh chives, Chopped', 'salt & freshly ground black pepper', '2 cups pecan halves, whole',<sep> directions: 'Combine the cream cheese, chives, salt, and pepper.', 'Spread a small amount on a pecan half and top with another pecan half.', 'Serve chilled or at room temperature.'

ingredients:  '2 cups all purpose flour', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1 cup Crisco', '4 tablespoons cold water',<sep> directions: 'Combine flour & salt. Cut in Crisco. Add water, and mix as little as possible. Bake according to filling recipe.'

ingredients:  '4 cups sugar', '4 cups water', '12 cup instant coffee', '2 quarts 100 proof vodka', '1 vanilla bean, chopped',<sep> directions: 'Boil sugar and water for 5 minutes.', 'Remove from heat and add coffee.', 'Cool.', 'Add vodka and vanilla bean.', 'Put in gallon jug.', 'Let stand for 30 days.', 'Shake daily.', 'Pour into bottles.'

ingredients:  '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 lb. ground beef', '1 (No. 2) can cooked green beans (2 1/2 c.)', '1 (10 1/2 or 11 oz.) can condensed tomato soup', '5 medium potatoes, cooked', '1/2 c. warm milk', '1 egg beaten', 'salt and pepper',<sep> directions: 'Cook onion until golden; add meat and seasoning.', 'Brown.', 'Add drained beans and soup; pour into greased 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.', 'Mash the potatoes; add the milk, egg and seasonings.', 'Spoon in mounds over meat.', 'Bake in moderate oven at 350° for 30 minutes. Makes 6 servings.'

ingredients:  '1 loaf frozen bread, thawed', '1/4 lb. salami', '1/4 lb. boiled ham', '1/4 lb. white American cheese', '1/4 lb. sliced pepperoni', '1 egg, beaten',<sep> directions: 'Break bread dough in half; roll out half in a little flour, stretching as you roll in shape of a rectangle.', 'Lengthwise put a layer of salami, layer of pepperoni, layer of cheese and layer of ham.', 'Fold ends in and sides together to form a loaf.', 'Press seam down.', 'Take beaten egg and brush on top.', 'Place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Repeat second half.', 'Bake at 350°', 'for 25 minutes. Let set 10 minutes before serving.', 'Makes 2 loaves.'

ingredients:  '1 can cream of chicken soup', '1 can chicken rice soup', '1 chicken, boiled (save liquid)', '1 box Stove Top dressing (chicken flavor)', '1 box Stove Top dressing (corn bread flavor)',<sep> directions: 'Mix soups together and pour in 9 x 13-inch baking dish.', 'Bone chicken and place on top of soups.', 'Use reserved chicken liquid to mix dressings.', 'Spoon over chicken and bake at 350° for 45 minutes.'

ingredients:  '2 (15 oz.) cans chili with beans', '1 (11 oz.) can condensed Cheddar cheese soup', '2 Tbsp. minced onions', '1 lb. franks', '8 to 10 hot dog buns, split and toasted', 'corn chips, coarsely crushed',<sep> directions: 'In large saucepan, combine chili with beans, cheese soup and onions.', 'Add franks; heat to boiling.', 'Simmer mixture about 5 minutes to blend flavors.', 'To serve, place a frank on each toasted bun.', 'Top each with chili cheese sauce and sprinkle with crushed corn chips.', 'Yield:', '8 to 10 sandwiches.'

ingredients:  '1 can tuna, drained', '3 hard-boiled eggs', '1/4 c. mayonnaise', '1/4 c. diced pickles', '1 Tbsp. pickle juice', '1 small onion',<sep> directions: 'Mix and serve on lettuce or use as sandwiches.'

ingredients:  '1 stick oleo', '1 c. flour', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '2 tsp. baking powder', '1 can sliced peaches (use juice also)', '1 c. cherry pie filling',<sep> directions: 'Melt oleo in a deep baking dish.', 'Set aside.', 'Mix flour, sugar and baking powder together.', 'Then pour milk over and mix good. Pour this mixture over oleo in a baking dish.', 'Mix peaches and cherry pie filling.', 'Be sure to leave juice with peaches.', 'Mix good, then pour fruit mixture over the other mixture in baking dish.', 'Sprinkle with 1/2 cup sugar.', 'Bake at 350° for 1 hour.'

ingredients:  '2 lb. squash, cooked and drained', '1 carrot, grated', '1 onion, chopped or grated', '1 small jar chopped pimento', '1 can cream of chicken soup', '1/2 to 1 pt. sour cream', '1 stick oleo, melted', '1 pkg. Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix (bread and herb)',<sep> directions: 'Mix cooked squash with other ingredients except for the oleo and stuffing mix.', 'Melt oleo and mix with stuffing mix.', 'Alternate layers of squash mixture and stuffing mixture.', 'Save enough stuffing mixture to put on top of casserole.', 'Bake in a 350° oven for 30 minutes.'

ingredients:  '1 pkg. white cake mix', '1 small pkg. instant vanilla pudding mix', '1/2 c. cooking oil', '1/4 c. vodka', '1/4 c. Galliano', '3/4 c. orange juice', '4 eggs',<sep> directions: 'Beat all ingredients together for four minutes.', 'Pour into a greased and floured baking pan and bake at 350° for 45 to 50 minutes.'

ingredients:  '1 pkg. lemon Jell-O', '1 c. boiling water', '1 c. corned beef, chopped', '3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped', '1 c. celery, chopped', '1/4 c. sweet pickles, chopped', '3/4 c. mayonnaise',<sep> directions: 'Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.', 'Add rest of ingredients. Stir together and chill.', 'Will keep in refrigerator several days.'

ingredients:  '1 box Crispix cereal', '1/2 c. butter', '12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips', '3/4 c. peanut butter', '1 1/2 c. powdered sugar',<sep> directions: 'Melt butter, peanut butter and chocolate chips in saucepan over low heat.', 'Pour this mixture over cereal and mix thoroughly until cereal is well coated.', 'Put half of cereal mixture into grocery bag with powdered sugar and shake until coated.', 'Add rest of cereal and shake well.', 'Store in covered container.'

ingredients:  '1 block Tofu', '80 grams Seasoned zha cai (Chinese pickle)', '1/2 tsp Soy sauce', '1 tbsp Oyster sauce', '1 tbsp Vinegar', '1/2 tsp Sugar', '1 tsp Sesame oil', '1 tbsp White toasted sesame seeds', '1 Ra-yu',<sep> directions: 'Make the sauce: Combine the soy sauce, oyster sauce, vinegar and sugar in a heatproof container, and microwave for 30 seconds.', 'Add the sesame oil and ra-yu and mix well.', 'Chop up the zha cai roughly.', 'Cut the tofu into quarters, top with the zha cai, and pour the sauce over.', 'Sprinkle with some sesame seeds and serve.'

ingredients:  '2 lb fetuccini or tortellini', '1 lb raw large shrimp peeled', '1 lb sea scallops', '10 oz fresh mushrooms', '1/2 cup fresh chopped basil', '4 tbs olive oil', '2/3 cup dry white wine', '2 can garlic alfredo sauce', 'pinch of salt', 'pinch of pepper',<sep> directions: 'In saucepan cook shrimp, scallops, mushrooms and basil in oil for 2 to 3 minutes or until shrimp are pink.', '', 'Add wine cook until most of the wine has evaporated, about 1 minute.', '', 'Add pasta sauce, heat through, season to taste with salt and pepper.', '', 'Serve mixture over hot pasta.'

ingredients:  '3 cups frozen French-style green beans', '1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted', '1 can (7 ounces) white or shoepeg corn, drained', '1 cup sour cream', '1 can (8 ounces) sliced water chestnuts, drained', '1/2 cup shredded process cheese (Velveeta)', '1 medium onion, chopped', '3 tablespoons butter', '3/4 cup crushed butter-flavored crackers (about 18 crackers)', '1/4 cup slivered almonds',<sep> directions: 'In a large bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. ingredients:  '1 (11 oz.) can mandarin orange sections', '2 (3 oz. each) pkg. or 1 (6 oz.) pkg. Add sherbet by spoonfuls, stirring until melted.', 'Chill until thickened.'

ingredients:  '1 lb. seashell macaroni', 'milk', '1/4 lb. sliced or grated American cheese', 'salt and pepper', '2 Tbsp. bacon fat', '1 c. diced celery', '2 hard-cooked eggs, sliced', 'mayonnaise',<sep> directions: 'Cook macaroni in boiling, salted water.', 'Drain well.', 'Add enough milk to cover and stir constantly while cooking to keep from sticking.', 'Add cheese, salt, pepper and bacon fat.', 'When cheese is well-melted, remove and cool.', 'Add celery and eggs.', 'Mix well with mayonnaise and serve on lettuce leaf.'

ingredients:  '2 pkg. instant vanilla pudding', '1 large angel food cake', '1 can strawberry pie filling', '1 tub Cool Whip',<sep> directions: 'Prepare pudding mix as directed on the package.
